nodes.text: Jason Ryan, nicknamed Pex on the Star Wars Galaxies forum,  was the Events Manager of the video game Star Wars Galaxies from August 2003 to May 2008. He organized and supported many in-game events, often playing characters from the Star Wars saga such as Princess Leia and Darth Vader at such events. A non-player character by the name of Pex was added to Galaxies as a tribute to Ryan. He was also a Community Manager for Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures.
